name: Password Reset Request
description: Fake password reset request template for phishing tests
subject: URGENT: Your Account Password Reset Request
body:
Password Reset Request

Dear Valued Customer,

We've received a request to reset your password. If you did not request this change, please ignore this email and your account will remain secure.

To reset your password, please click on the button below:

Reset Password

This link will expire in 24 hours for security reasons.

If the button above doesn't work, please copy and paste the following URL into your browser:

https://account-verification.example.com/reset?token=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9

If you didn't request a password reset, please contact our security team immediately at security@example.com.

Regards,
The Security Team

This email was sent to you as a registered user of our service. Please do not reply to this message; it was sent from an unmonitored email address.
